name: test_end_to_end_flow
description:
End-to-End Test Flow:
    1. Register a new user.
    2. Logout.
    3. Login with the registered credentials.
    4. Search and add a product to cart.
    5. Verify cart contents.
descriptionHtml:
End-to-End Test Flow:
1. Register a new user.
2. Logout.
3. Login with the registered credentials.
4. Search and add a product to cart.
5. Verify cart contents.
statusMessage: AssertionError: Locator expected to have text '$602.00' Actual value: $1,204.00 Call log: - Expect "to_have_text" with timeout 5000ms - waiting for locator("//*[@id='content']/div[2]/div/table//strong[text()='Total:']//following::td") 8 × locator resolved to $1,204.00 - unexpected value "$1,204.00"
statusTrace: page = @pytest.mark.end_to_end def test_end_to_end_flow(page): """ End-to-End Test Flow: 1. Register a new user. 2. Logout. 3. Login with the registered credentials. 4. Search and add a product to cart. 5. Verify cart contents. """ # Step 1: Register a new account and capture the generated email registered_email,registered_password = perform_registration(page) print("✅ Registration completed successfully!") # Step 2: Logout after registration perform_logout(page) print("✅ Logout completed successfully!") # Step 3: Login with registered email perform_login(page, registered_email,registered_password) print("✅ Login completed successfully!") # Step 4: Search product and add to cart add_product_to_cart(page) print("✅ Product added to cart successfully!") # Step 5: Verify cart details > verify_shopping_cart(page) tests/test_end_to_end.py:43: _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ page = def verify_shopping_cart(page): product_page = ProductPage(page) product_page.click_items_to_navigate_to_cart() shopping_cart = product_page.click_view_cart() config = Config() print("🛒 Navigated to Shopping Cart Page!") > expect(shopping_cart.get_total_price()).to_have_text(config.total_price) E AssertionError: Locator expected to have text '$602.00' E Actual value: $1,204.00 E Call log: E - Expect "to_have_text" with timeout 5000ms E - waiting for locator("//*[@id='content']/div[2]/div/table//strong[text()='Total:']//following::td") E 8 × locator resolved to $1,204.00 E - unexpected value "$1,204.00" tests/test_end_to_end.py:163: AssertionError
